metadata.name: Through Thick and Thin
metadata.description: "Through Thick and Thin" is a piece that celebrates the unwavering loyalty of true friends. It pays tribute to those who stand by your side through every challenge, struggle, and hardship, and who help you weather the storms of life. This piece is a testament to the power of friendship - not only to be with you in the midst of difficulty, but to lift you up and carry you through it. It is a reminder of the profound impact that the support and solidarity of good friends can have on our lives, and a tribute to the unbreakable bond that can form between those who stand together through thick and thin."
